pages.title: About Us | Astro Widgets
pages.description: Astro is a modern frontend framework designed for building fast, optimized websites with ease. Combining the best of static site generation and dynamic rendering, Astro helps developers create high-performance web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences. With its component-driven architecture and seamless integration with popular libraries, Astro is revolutionizing the way we build for the web.
